name: The Adventures of Jumpy, Walky, Shooty, and Crouchy
name_original: The Adventures of Jumpy, Walky, Shooty, and Crouchy
description:
A game made for Global Game Jam 2018-- ONLY on the Saturday of the Jam!

Jumpy, Walky, Shooty and Crouchy are 4 weird green rectangle creatures ('drawn' via the finest programmer art) that each have their own unique abilities.
Jumpy can jump.
Walky can walk!
...You get the idea.

However, when they touch one another they're able to transfer their abilities!

Help the 4 friends share their powers to navigate through the game's various puzzle levels.

Use arrow keys or WASD to jump, move and crouch, and the SPACEBAR to shoot... when you can!

Only one character needs to reach the exit door of each level in order to advance.
